page.title: 09A DAY FOR GARETH SWANAGE
page.content: On Wednesdays I get up at 7.00am, I get dressed and have my breakfast. My favourite breakfast is porridge and a glass of milk. After this I have a wash and clean my teeth. At 8.30 I feed my guinea pig called Snowman. My sister has 3 guinea pigs called: Yummy, Susan and Lynette. My friend's mother gives me a lift to school in their car at 8.45. When I get to school I play until the bell goes. Then I go into my classroom and we all say our prayers. We then work on our Domesday Project which I like very much because we visit lots of places and then we write about them. It is great fun to go on the visits. At 10.30 it is playtime. If it is fine we play on the field, but in the winter we play on the playground. We all prefer to play on the field because then we can play football.
